snippet: On the heels of a playoff weekend in which the Yankees played in front of thousands of empty seats in the Bronx, the team now appears concerned that it will be unable to sell out next weekend.
abstract: New York Yankees have been struggling to fill seats in Yankee Stadium and, if the team reaches Games 6 and 7 of the American League championship series against Detroit Tigers, those games may not sell out.
lead_paragraph: On the heels of a playoff weekend in which the Yankees played in front of thousands of empty seats in the Bronx, the team now appears concerned that it will be unable to sell out next weekend.

headline.seo: With Empty Seats at Yankee Stadium, Fans Search for Ticket Deals
headline.main: Filling Seats Is Challenge for Yankees
headline.print_headline: Filling Seats Is Challenge For Yankees
